A Dialogue betwixt H.B.'s ghost and his dear author R.L.S.
1 sheet ([2] p.)
Printed for J.M., London : [1681]
A satire on Henry Brome (H.B.) and Roger L'Estrange (R.L.S.). In prose and verse. Date of Publication from Wing. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
